member.name: P:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.Data.AnalyticsSnapshot.Browsers
member.summary: Top browsers, e.g. "Chrome"; sorted by (descending) click counts. Only present if this data is available.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.Data.AnalyticsSnapshot.Countries
member.summary: Top countries (expressed as country codes), e.g. "US" or "DE"; sorted by (descending) click counts. Only present if this data is available.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.Data.AnalyticsSnapshot.LongUrlClicks
member.summary: Number of clicks on all goo.gl short URLs pointing to this long URL.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.Data.AnalyticsSnapshot.Platforms
member.summary: Top platforms or OSes, e.g. "Windows"; sorted by (descending) click counts. Only present if this data is available.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.Data.AnalyticsSnapshot.Referrers
member.summary: Top referring hosts, e.g. "www.google.com"; sorted by (descending) click counts. Only present if this data is available.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.Data.AnalyticsSnapshot.ShortUrlClicks
member.summary: Number of clicks on this short URL.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.Data.StringCount.Count
member.summary: Number of clicks for this top entry, e.g. for this particular country or browser.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.Data.StringCount.Id
member.summary: Label assigned to this top entry, e.g. "US" or "Chrome".

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.Data.Url.Created
member.summary: Time the short URL was created; ISO 8601 representation using the yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZZ format, e.g. "2010-10-14T19:01:24.944+00:00".

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.Data.Url.Id
member.summary: Short URL, e.g. "http://goo.gl/l6MS".

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.Data.Url.Kind
member.summary: The fixed string "urlshortener#url".

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.Data.Url.LongUrl
member.summary: Long URL, e.g. "http://www.google.com/". Might not be present if the status is "REMOVED".

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.Data.Url.Status
member.summary: Status of the target URL. Possible values: "OK", "MALWARE", "PHISHING", or "REMOVED". A URL might be marked "REMOVED" if it was flagged as spam, for example.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.Data.UrlHistory.Items
member.summary: A list of URL resources.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.Data.UrlHistory.ItemsPerPage
member.summary: Number of items returned with each full "page" of results. Note that the last page could have fewer items than the "itemsPerPage" value.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.Data.UrlHistory.Kind
member.summary: The fixed string "urlshortener#urlHistory".

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.Data.UrlHistory.NextPageToken
member.summary: A token to provide to get the next page of results.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.Data.UrlHistory.TotalItems
member.summary: Total number of short URLs associated with this user (may be approximate).

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.UrlshortenerService.Key
member.summary: Sets the API-Key (or DeveloperKey) which this service uses for all requests

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.UrlshortenerService.Scopes
member.summary: A list of all OAuth2.0 scopes. Each of these scopes relates to a permission or group of permissions that different methods of this API may need.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.UrlshortenerService.Scopes.Urlshortener
member.summary: Manage your goo.gl short URLs

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.UrlResource.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Expands a short URL or gets creation time and analytics.
member.param: Required - The short URL, including the protocol.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.UrlResource.Insert(Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.Data.Url)
member.summary: Creates a new short URL.

member.name: M:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.UrlResource.List
member.summary: Retrieves a list of URLs shortened by a user.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.UrlResource.Projection
member.summary: Additional information to return.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.UrlResource.Projection.ANALYTICS_CLICKS
member.summary: Returns only click counts.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.UrlResource.Projection.ANALYTICS_TOP_STRINGS
member.summary: Returns only top string counts.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.UrlResource.Projection.FULL
member.summary: Returns the creation timestamp and all available analytics.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.UrlResource.ProjectionEnum
member.summary: Additional information to return.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.UrlResource.ProjectionEnum.ANALYTICS_CLICKS
member.summary: Returns short URL click counts.

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.UrlResource.ProjectionEnum.FULL
member.summary: Returns short URL click counts.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.UrlResource.GetRequest.Oauth_token
member.summary: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.UrlResource.GetRequest.PrettyPrint
member.summary: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.UrlResource.GetRequest.Projection
member.summary: Additional information to return.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.UrlResource.GetRequest.ShortUrl
member.summary: The short URL, including the protocol.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.UrlResource.InsertRequest.Oauth_token
member.summary: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.UrlResource.InsertRequest.PrettyPrint
member.summary: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.UrlResource.InsertRequest.Body
member.summary: Gets/Sets the Body of this Request.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.UrlResource.ListRequest.Oauth_token
member.summary: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.UrlResource.ListRequest.PrettyPrint
member.summary: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.UrlResource.ListRequest.Projection
member.summary: Additional information to return.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Urlshortener.v1.UrlResource.ListRequest.StartToken
member.summary: Token for requesting successive pages of results.
